name: Zarata Kid
description:
ZarataKid is a roll-the-dice based turn-based RPG game. Player skills, attack points and defense points are formed by the dice which player rolls. After then, the battle occurs between player and the enemy. And also, there are some dice in the art of the game. It made for GMTK GameJam 2022 in 48 hours by Mehmetcan Polat and SefaYunus_

HOW TO PLAY
By selecting what character to do against the enemy and rolling the dice player can attack, defend or heal with pressing battle button. When the enemy's health point become zero, the player wins.
